alert.note: Alert for Brown (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 08 at 10:01PM CDT until May 08 at 10:45PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1045 PM CDT FOR SOUTHERN BROWN AND NORTHERN SAN SABA COUNTIES... At 958 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located near Brookesmith...to Indian Creek to Zephyr moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Brookesmith around 1015 PM CDT. Elm Grove around 1050 PM CDT. Skeeterville around 1100 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Harkeyville, Spring Creek, Us-190 Near The Mcculloch- San Saba County Line, Locker, Hall and Indian Creek. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
